generated_body: If you click on the article titled "MSNBC brings George Conway as analyst for Trump hearing," you can expect a detailed overview of George Conway's role as a political analyst in the context of the Trump hearings. The article is likely to discuss Conway's background, including his connections to the Trump administration and his previous commentary on political issues. Additionally, it may provide insights into the significance of his analysis during the hearings and how his perspectives could influence public understanding of the proceedings.
